pr_title: [STORM-3704] - Cosmetic: fix table header alignment in "Topology summary" table.

timeline.message:
[STORM-3704] - Cosmetic: fix table header alignment in "Topology summary" table.

As part of STORM-3534 (https://github.com/apache/storm/pull/3163) new column
was added to this table, however the header for it was added outside
"if schedulerDisplayResource" logic while rows are inside, causing
misalignment.
